variants.variant0: What is the IMAGE_DOS_HEADER.e_magic in ASCII?
variants.variant1: What is the numeric value of the IMAGE_DOS_HEADER.e_magic?

variants.variant0: How far into the binary is the IMAGE_NT_HEADERS structure?
variants.variant1: How far into the binary is the structure with the 'PE' signature?
variants.variant3: What is the offset from the end of the IMAGE_DOS_HEADER to the IMAGE_NT_HEADERS?

variants.variant0: What year was this binary compiled according to the file header TimeDateStamp?
variants.variant2: How many years old is this binary? (round down)

variants.variant0: Is this a 32 bit or 64 bit binary? (Enter 32 or 64)
variants.variant1: Is this a PE32 or PE32+ binary? (Enter pe32 or pe32+)
variants.variant3: What IMAGE_FILE_HEADER.Machine value indicates a 64 bit binary?
variants.variant4: What IMAGE_FILE_HEADER.Machine value indicates a 32 bit binary?

variants.variant0: How many sections does this binary have?
Is the IMAGE_FILE_EXECUTABLE_IMAGE file header characteristic set? (Enter Y or N)
variants.variant1: Is this file a regular executable (.exe)? (Enter Y or N)
variants.variant2: Is the IMAGE_FILE_DLL file header characteristic set? (Enter Y or N)
variants.variant3: Is this file a dynamic-link library (.dll)? (Enter Y or N)
variants.variant4: Is the IMAGE_FILE_LARGE_ADDRESS_AWARE file header characteristic set? (Enter Y or N)
variants.variant5: Does this file support being loaded at an address > 2GB? (Enter Y or N)
variants.variant6: Is the IMAGE_FILE_32BIT_MACHINE file header characteristic set? (Enter Y or N)
variants.variant8: How many characteristics are set in this file's file header?
